titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the report entitled "Highway Bridge Replacement and Rehabilitation Program, Eighth Annual Report to Congress" as a Senate document.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 438.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/29/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the printing of the annual report of the Secretary of Transportation entitled "Highway Bridge Replacement and Rehabilitation Program Eighth Annual Report to Congress" as a Senate document.
